summation_rule: Apply algebraic summation. Current tax and deferred tax may have debit (expense) or credit (benefit) balances. Preserve signs throughout calculations. Negative values indicate tax benefits/credits.
additional_instructions: Tax expense includes both current and deferred tax components. Current tax represents the actual tax payable/receivable for the period. Deferred tax represents the tax effect of temporary differences. Both components should preserve their natural signs (debit = expense, credit = benefit). The total tax expense may be positive (expense) or negative (benefit) depending on the components.
